comment_output_directory: Optional: Global output directory for all generated PPTX files. Can be overridden per task. Default is current directory.
comment_model_version: Model version to use for video generation. Options: 'v1.6', 'v2.1'. Default is 'v2.1' if not specified.

schedule.comment: Time format: HH:MM (24-hour format). Leave empty to start immediately

tasks.prompt: The male protagonist stands up first. Suddenly, he is gently pressed back against a solid, clearly visible indoor wall. The camera begins to circle around them from the side. The second person, already present, steps in with emotional intensity. He raises one arm and places an open palm firmly on the wall beside the main character’s head, his posture confident and dominant. As he moves closer, his body presses more firmly against the main character, creating a textbook kabedon moment. Their bodies lean slightly forward, faces inches apart, eyes locked with rising tension. The camera captures both of their side profiles, emphasizing the intensity of their emotional connection. After a brief moment of charged stillness, he suddenly leans in and they share a deep, passionate kiss — fully immersed in the emotion of the moment.​​
